description.narrative: This activity (Political Champions) is a component of Disaster Resilience Catalytic Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £1,782,464. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Disaster prevention and preparedness. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, DAI Europe, Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office, International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD), International Rescue Committee (UK), Overseas Development Institute, PwC, United Nations Development Programme (UNDP). The start date is 01-11-2012 and the end date is 31-03-2016.
